remarks: Double polarity of a projective map.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
2polpmap.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
2polpmap.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
2polpmap.p $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
2polpmapN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( M ` X ) ) ) = ( M ` X ) ) $.
